other_tests.findings: The right kidney measures 10.3 cm, and the left kidney measures 10.6 cm. The renal parenchyma is mildly echogenic. There is no hydronephrosis, mass, or calculus in either kidney. Color images demonstrate normal flow bilaterally. The resistive indices within the main arteries bilaterally are within normal limits. The urinary bladder is moderately distended and is unremarkable.
